jobDescription: ******************************************************************************************************************Top-Tier financial industry client has openings for Business Data Analyst (Strong SQL) with SQL, Data Warehouse & Banking experience.****************************************************************************************************************Job Title: Business Data Analyst (Strong SQL) Location: San Francisco, CA Skills: SQL, Data Warehouse, Data Mart, Credit Card, Deposit The Opportunity:Client: Direct Client Location: San Francisco, CA Job Title: Business Data Analyst (Strong SQL) Duration: 18 - 24 Months Desired Qualification:A BS/BA degree or higher7+ years of Banking experience5+ years of experience with Credit card and Deposit data domains5+ Years of experience in a Data warehouse/Data mart/Data Integration environment.3+ years of STRONG SQL experience5+ years of business systems analysis experience, business systems design experience, or a combination of both  ******************************************************************************************************************  If you find yourself a match to above opening and had worked with SQL, Data Warehouse, Data Mart & BankingContact (Walid Khan)  Contact – 415-696-5353walidkhan.khan@collabera.com ******************************************************************************************************************provided by Dice SQL, Data Warehouse, Data Mart, Credit Card, Deposit
